scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, likely a scribe or prophet, sits on an ornate chair, dressed in dark robes and a turban. He is shown writing on a scroll, with a quill in his hand. Beside him, a winged ox, a symbol of Saint Luke, lies down, also adorned with a halo and a decorative cloth. The scene is set against a dark, patterned background, with architectural elements suggesting an interior space. A potted plant sits on a pedestal in the background. The overall composition evokes a sense of divine inspiration or scholarly endeavor.
